privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how Simple Tuition collects, uses, and protects personal information provided through our website.

sections.heading: Information we collect
sections.body: When you submit an enquiry, we collect contact details and any information you provide about tutoring needs or tutor applications. We may also collect basic analytics data such as UTM parameters.

sections.heading: How we use information
sections.body: We use this information to respond to enquiries, match students with tutors, assess tutor applications, and communicate about our services. We only contact you with consent where required.

sections.heading: CVs and attachments
sections.body: Tutor applications may include CV attachments. These are sent to our inbox and used solely for assessment purposes.

sections.heading: Data storage and sharing
sections.body: We store enquiry records securely and do not sell or share your personal information with third parties, except for service providers that help us run the website and deliver emails.

sections.heading: Your rights
sections.body: You may request access to, correction of, or deletion of your personal information. Contact us to make a request.

sections.heading: Contact
sections.body: For privacy questions, email us at

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These Terms of Service outline the conditions for using the Simple Tuition website and services.

sections.heading: Services
sections.body: Simple Tuition provides tutoring introductions and coordination. Tutors operate independently and manage their own session logistics.

sections.heading: Enquiries and matching
sections.body: We use the details you provide to recommend suitable tutors. We do not guarantee availability or outcomes, but we aim to make the best match possible.

sections.heading: Payments and pricing
sections.body: Pricing varies by tutor experience and subject. Fees, scheduling, and cancellations are agreed directly between you and the tutor.

sections.heading: Tutor applicants
sections.body: Applications are assessed on merit and fit. We may request additional information during the review process.

sections.heading: Liability
sections.body: We make reasonable efforts to match families with tutors but are not liable for outcomes, availability, or actions taken by independent tutors.
